Anime themed mobile games are huge in China
NextBigFuture.com
paragraph:
China’s mobile gaming market recorded total revenue of 35.6 billion yuan (US$5.1 billion) for the third quarter. This was up 17% year-on-year and 10 percent sequentially.Anime-themed titles generated nearly 40% of total gross revenue from the two dozen new games released in the third quarter. This was about $2 billion of revenue for the quarter.China has tightened gaming access this year over internet addiction, childhood myopia and inappropriate content.
